title: [Large-Scale] Microlearning Course for Efficient Facility Management in Higher Education Institutions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of university facility management and foundational knowledge of maintenance
context.additional_context: Learners Role-Play as General Citizens to Study Efficient Management Strategies for University Facilities in Mobile Environments. Project-Based Assessment Evaluates Practical Application Skills.

learning_goals: One can comparatively analyze the strengths and weaknesses of university facility management approaches (in-house maintenance, outsourcing, one-site)
One can propose outsourcing strategy frameworks for improving learning environments
One can design efficiency evaluation metrics for facility management using mobile learning modules
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
